page.title: 11NORTH DENES HOLIDAY CENTRE
page.content: THE NORTH DENES SEASHORE HOLIDAY CENTRE, GT.YARMOUTH The Seashore Holiday Centre was originally owned by the Beckett family. It was opened in 1953, & had only 160 caravans, a shop,a store room and an office. In 1955 the 'Mermaid' Club was opened. By 1960 a Swimming Pool was built. Then the business was sold to the Caister Group,who didn't have enough money to advertise and keep up standards, and so sold it to Ladbroke's. Mr. Starbuck visited our school and told us their season started around Whitsun & ended in late September. At any one time, up to 5.5 thousand people may stay at the camp, and because of the numbers, a lot of staff are needed.
